translation:
Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir

The letter from Your Excellency Father Francisco Terroba, requesting the erection of a chapel at the Itaqui pass, has been presented to the Government, concerning which Your Excellency Your Excellency

God keep Your Excellency Secretariat of Justice in Alegrete, September 26, 1842. Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir Father Francisco das Chagas Martins Ávila e Sousa, Apostolic Vicar. José Pedroso de Albuquerque.

A letter follows with Barbacena’s opinion on means to end the war.
